Archive.description: Gene archive table is up to date.
Archive.name: Archive

ArraysHaveProbes.description: All arrays are associated with probes.
ArraysHaveProbes.name: ArraysHaveProbes

AssemblyConsistent.description: Assembly is the same in core and core-like databases
AssemblyConsistent.name: AssemblyConsistent

AssemblyExceptions.description: Check if assembly_exceptions are present and correct.
AssemblyExceptions.name: AssemblyExceptions

AssemblySeqregion.description: assembly and seq_region table are consistent.
AssemblySeqregion.name: AssemblySeqregion

AttribValues.description: TSL, APPRIS, GENCODE and RefSeq attributes exist
AttribValues.name: AttribValues

CompareBiotype.description: Check for more than 25% difference between the number of genes in two databases, broken down by biotype.
CompareBiotype.name: CompareBiotype

CompareSchema.description: Compare database schema to definition in SQL file
CompareSchema.name: CompareSchema

ControlledTablesCore.description: Check that controlled tables are consistent with production database
ControlledTablesCore.name: ControlledTablesCore

ControlledTablesVariation.description: Check that controlled tables are consistent with production database
ControlledTablesVariation.name: ControlledTablesVariation

CoordSystemConsistent.description: Coord system is the same in core and core-like databases
CoordSystemConsistent.name: CoordSystemConsistent

CurrentRegulatoryBuildHasEpigenomes.description: Check if the current regulatory build has epigenomes data
CurrentRegulatoryBuildHasEpigenomes.name: CurrentRegulatoryBuildHasEpigenomes

Denormalized.description: Check that denormalized columns are synchronised
Denormalized.name: Denormalized

EpigenomeHasSegmentationFile.description: Check that every epigenome which is part of the current Regulatory Build has a segmentation file in the segmentation_file table
EpigenomeHasSegmentationFile.name: EpigenomeHasSegmentationFile

ExperimentHasFeatureSet.description: Check that every distinct experiment, epigenome and feature_type combination is linked to a feature_set
ExperimentHasFeatureSet.name: ExperimentHasFeatureSet

FeatureBounds.description: Ensure that features are within the bounds of their seq_region
FeatureBounds.name: FeatureBounds

ForeignKeys.description: Check for incorrect foreign key relationships
ForeignKeys.name: ForeignKeys

GeneBiotypes.description: Check that genes and transcripts have valid biotypes
GeneBiotypes.name: GeneBiotypes

GeneBounds.description: Ensure that genes are within the bounds of their seq_region
GeneBounds.name: GeneBounds

GeneCounts.description: Check that gene counts are correct
GeneCounts.name: GeneCounts

GeneGC.description: Check that every gene has a GC statistic
GeneGC.name: GeneGC

GenomeStatistics.description: Check that genome statistics are present and correct
GenomeStatistics.name: GenomeStatistics

LRG.description: Check that LRG features and seq_regions are correctly associated.
LRG.name: LRG

MetaCoord.description: Check that the meta_coord table is correctly populated
MetaCoord.name: MetaCoord

MetaKeyCardinality.description: Check cardinality of meta data that must be single-valued
MetaKeyCardinality.name: MetaKeyCardinality

MetaTable.description: Ensure that meta table has valid meta_keys
MetaTable.name: MetaTable

MySQLStorageEngine.description: Check if database schema does not match the given MySQL storage engine
MySQLStorageEngine.name: MySQLStorageEngine

PepstatsAttributes.description: Check that every translation has pepstats statistics
PepstatsAttributes.name: PepstatsAttributes

PhenotypeDescription.description: Check that imported description contains only supported characters
PhenotypeDescription.name: PhenotypeDescription

ProteinTranslation.description: Check that every protein-coding gene has a valid translation
ProteinTranslation.name: ProteinTranslation

RegulatoryFeatureIsActive.description: Check that every regulatory feature has a valid activity value in at least one epigenome.
RegulatoryFeatureIsActive.name: RegulatoryFeatureIsActive

SampleRegulatoryFeatureExists.description: Check if the current regulatory build has a sample regulatory feature
SampleRegulatoryFeatureExists.name: SampleRegulatoryFeatureExists

SchemaPatchesApplied.description: Check that schema patches are up-to-date
SchemaPatchesApplied.name: SchemaPatchesApplied

SchemaType.description: Check that the schema type meta key matches the DB name
SchemaType.name: SchemaType

SchemaVersion.description: Check that the schema version meta_key matches the DB name
SchemaVersion.name: SchemaVersion

SequenceLevel.description: Check that DNA is attached and only attached to sequence-level seq_regions.
SequenceLevel.name: SequenceLevel

SpeciesNameUnique.description: Check that production_name and alias are unique across all species
SpeciesNameUnique.name: SpeciesNameUnique

XrefTypes.description: Check that xrefs are only attached to one feature type.
XrefTypes.name: XrefTypes
